alert.note: Alert for Logan; Wallace (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 6:29PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Wallace and northwestern Logan Counties through 600 PM MDT/700 PM CDT/... At 529 PM MDT/629 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northeast of Wallace, or 18 miles northeast of Sharon Springs, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of east central Wallace and northwestern Logan Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
